hubOrgAdminUsernameDescription: username or alias for the dev hub org; overrides default dev hub org
adminUsernameDescription: username or alias for the target org; overrides default target org
apiVersionDescription: override the api version used for api requests made by this command
definitionFileDescription: path to a store definition file

setup.templateNameDescription: template to use to create a site
setup.storeNameDescription: name of the site to create

create.cmdDescription: Comprehensive create and set up a store.  This will create your community/store push store sources, create buyer user, import products, create search index.
create.automaticallySettingPermFailedPleaseDoIt:
Automatically setting perm failed, please do it manually. 
In the opened page, search for B2CLiteAccess and CommerceEnabled, and make sure they are checked. If not, check them and click Save
If the page asks for a username/password, the org is still being created. If so, wait five minutes then re-run the command below until sfdx logs you in automatically.
create.pressEnterWhenPermIsSet: Press [ENTER] when you've set the perm
create.waitingForWebStoreId: Waiting for webstore id to show up...
create.storeNotCreatedWait10Sec: Store not yet created, waiting 10 seconds...
create.waited5MinNoStoreId: Waited 5 minutes for storeId but storeid still doesn't exist
create.statusIndicatesCompletedSkipping: Status file indicates this command is completed successfully, skipping
create.messageIntentToCreateInfo:
Creates a new store in the org in which the admin is '%s'
Creates a buyer account with the specified buyer account username '%s'
The template name is %s and the store name is %s
All usernames must to be lower case.

create.openingBrowserTheStoreAdminPage: Opening the store admin page in the browser...
create.waitingForCommunity: Waiting for community to become available
create.communityStillNotAvailableCount: Community still not available after count: %s retrying

Setting up the store and creating the buyer user...

create.assigningShopperProfileToBuyer: Assigning Shopper profile to the buyer user
create.changingPasswordForBuyer: Changing password for the buyer user
create.createSearchIndexInfo: Creating search index. You need %s plugin installed for this to work.

setup.orgCreationNotCompletedSuccesfully: The status file indicates that org creation was not completed succesfully. Please complete org creation before attempting to set up a store.

Using this to retrieve your store info:

setup.doneRegAndMapPriceIntegrations: Done Registering and mapping pricing integrations
setup.urlForResOfMappingIntegrations: You can view the results of the mapping in the Store Integrations page at %s%s%s
setup.errorRegApexClassForIntegrationsInfo:
There was a problem getting the ID of the Apex class %s for checkout integrations.
The registration and mapping for this class will be skipped!
Make sure that you %s and execute %s before setting up your store.
setup.alreadyMappingInStoreForServiceProviderT: There is already a mapping in this store for %s ServiceProviderType: %s
setup.existingMappingForPriceServiceProviderTy: There is already a mapping in this store for Price ServiceProviderType: %s
setup.insToRegExternalPricingIntegration: To register an external pricing integration, delete the internal pricing mapping and then add the external pricing mapping.  See the code for details how.
setup.creatingPaymentGatewayRecordMerchantCred: Creating PaymentGateway record using MerchantCredentialId=%s, PaymentGatewayProviderId=%s.
setup.creatingStoreIntegratedServiceWithStoreP: Creating StoreIntegratedService using the %s store and Integration=%s (PaymentGatewayId)
setup.updatingMembersListActivatingCommunityAn: Updating members list, activating community and adding guest user.
setup.errorNoBuyerGroupNameProductImportFailed: No Buyer Group Name - Product Import must have failed
setup.thisDeveloperNameAlreadyExists: This Developer Name already exists or has been previously used.
setup.creatingBuyerUserWithContactAndAccount: Creating Buyer User with associated Contact and Account.
setup.assigningBuyerAccountToBuyerGroup: Assigning Buyer Account to Buyer Group.
setup.makeSiteAndNavMenuItemPublic: Make Site and Nav Menu Item Public
setup.enableGuestBrowsingForWebStoreAndCreateG: Enable Guest Browsing for WebStore and create Guest Buyer Profile.
setup.errorGettingGuestBuyerProfileIdOfWebStor: There was a problem getting the GuestBuyerProfileId of the WebStore where name is %s for enableGuestBrowsing.

setup.addContactPointAddressesToBuyerAccount: Add Contact Point Addresses to the Buyer Account.

setup.creatingPackageToDeployWithNewFlow: Creating the package to deploy, including the new flow.

setup.removingXmlFilesPackageForRetrievingAndD: Removing the package xml files used for retrieving and deploying metadata at this step.

create.cmdDescription: Use this command to just create a community.  It will use sfdx force:community:create until a community is created or failed.
create.creatingNewStoreInQueUpTo10Minutes: Creating a new store, this may take up to 10 minutes until it's available.
create.storeCreatedByQuickStartScript: Store %s created by Quick Start script.
create.enterDifferentNameExists: Enter a different name. That one already exists.
